name: Food Court Hamburger Fever 3
description:
Love New Cooking Games? Well, one of the App Store’s most fun cooking simulation & restaurant management games just got even better with feverish cooking madness! "Food Court Hamburger Fever 3" is introducing the NEW DELI SHOP to serve it’s ever-increasing HUNGRY customers in the most fun among food court games for super food chefs!

After a successful Pizza shop, Seafood Restaurant cooking scramble & crazy lobster and seafood restaurant management! You will be wearing many hats eg a burger master, baker, Pizza, sushi chef & seafood chef. Time to challenge your super chef skills and run your own DELI Shop - cook, bake, serve delicious & mouth-watering bites for your hungry customers in this addicting time management chef game. DOWNLOAD "Food Court Hamburger Fever 3" today for deliciously crazy cooking madness!

Challenge your time management skills with this incredibly fast-paced restaurant simulation chef game with the newly released Deli shop. With so many fun cooking simulation food games to choose from, it may be a tough call to pick one, where the kitchen scramble & story can satisfy a true superstar chef with the unique fast food cooking game madness. But if you are ready to take on the crazy cooking and become a star chef, "Food Court Hamburger Fever 3" will serve up the perfect food court kitchen fever.

Starting with a single restaurant, build yourself up into a famous Super Chef, specializing in multiple cuisines from around the world including seafood restaurants, sushi house & pizza shop and improving your cooking skills as you progress in the game. Upgrade your equipment, earn coins and gems, and expand your restaurant empire to include various types of awesome eats: Mexican, burgers, donuts, sushi, pizza, Seafood and the new DELI Restaurant!

Features:
■ The ultimate restaurant management & chef game with vivid graphics and funky characters
■ The fastest, most fun new cooking game on the Stores!
■ Now with “TAP” now instead of Drag - that was so 2016!
■ 220+ challenging levels - You’ll need tons of upgrades to become a Star Super Chef!
■ Unlock multiple restaurants: Mexican, donuts, burgers, sushi, seafood, pizza and the Deli!
■ Share your Super chef scores, kitchen story & cooking scramble on Facebook

Super Chefs, are you ready for an epic cooking fever & scramble? Can you conquer the cooking dash & kitchen scramble? Are your Super Chef’s stories worthy of sharing worldwide? Install and start playing this chef game to discover new recipes and crazy cooking fun. This feverish new cooking simulation game taps into the fundamentals of restaurant and time management skills. Only you, the Star Chef, can manage this manic restaurant mania, building an Empire that includes SEVEN different restaurants.

"Food Court Hamburger Fever 3" adds a fun twist that makes it the leader among even the most popular cooking dash and time management games. It’s no surprise that this new simulation cooking game comes from the makers of the Food Court Fever series, which has been enjoyed by nearly TEN MILLION PLAYERS! Unleash your super chef food making skills in the most fun food chef game.

Download "Food Court Hamburger Fever 3" NOW! Enjoy this incredible cooking simulation game, become the superstar chef among renowned world chefs!
